subject: Public Speaking
title: Stories That Transcend Culture
description: One-minute skill: Stories That Transcend Culture.

hook.text: Some stories work everywhere: love, loss, hope, fear, belonging.

buildup.text: Universal stories draw from human experiences all cultures share.

discovery.text: Avoid culture-specific references that exclude parts of audiences.

twist.text: The more human and less local the story, the wider it travels.

climax.text: Great speakers craft stories that resonate across every boundary.

punchline.text: Speak to the human condition. It knows no borders.

quiz.question: What makes stories universal?
options: They tap into shared human experiences
